name: Fix Linting Issues
description: Run linting checks and fix issues across the codebase
prompt:
Run `make check lint` to identify linting issues.

Fix all issues found:
1. Remove unused variables, functions, constants, and imports
2. Fix any formatting issues
3. Address any other linting warnings

Work systematically through each file with issues.
Run `make check lint` again after fixes to verify.

Provide a summary of what was fixed.
